original_text: I said to the sea, “This is as far as you can come. You may come no further. Your powerful waves must stop there!” I said to the sea, “This is as far as you can come.
korean_text: 이르기를 네가 여기까지 오고 더 넘어가지 못하리니 네 높은 파도가 여기서 그칠지니라 하였노라

sentences.original_text: This is as far as you can come

sentences.korean_translation: 너는 더 이상 올 수 없다

sentences.original_text: Your powerful waves must stop there
sentences.korean_translation: 너의 강력한 파도는 거기서 멈춰야 한다

sentences.original_text: This is as far as you can come
